info.name: FLVS
info.description: FLVS is an online virtual learning school site. Use it with my Algebra Nation Dark Theme for the perfect night learning experience.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0: Released without placeholder because it was in private beta for like 2 months and I'm too lazy.
Version 1.1: I'm really bad at keeping track of what has changed but there are lots of new and improved things so eh.
